text: This is the list of best-selling albums in Portugal based in several sources, including Lusa news agency and Jornal de Notícias. ==Table== http://www.janusonline.pt/2003/2003_1_4_15.html#1 {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%; text-align: center" |- style="background:#e8e8e8;" ! scope="col" | Artist ! scope="col" | Album ! scope="col" | Released ! scope="col" | Genre ! scope="col" | Claimed sales |- |Daniela Mercury |Feijão com Arroz |1996 |Axé, MPB |240.000 - 276.000 |- |Delfins |O Caminho Da Felicidade |1995 |Pop rock |240.000 |- |Paulo Gonzo |Quase Tudo |1997 |Pop rock |220.000 - 240.000 |- |Iran Costa |Álbum Dance |1995 |Dance music, Pop |200.000 - 220.000 |- |Andrea Bocelli |Romanza |1996 |Adult contemporary, Operatic pop |200.000 - 210.000 |- |Delfins |Saber A~Mar |1996 |Pop rock |200.000 - 201.000 |- |Silence 4 |Silence Becomes It |1998 |Indie pop |200.000 |- |Luciana Abreu |Floribella |2006 |Pop |200.000 |- |Pedro Abrunhosa |Tempo |1996 |Pop rock |185.000 |- |Rui Veloso |Mingos & Os Samurais |1990 |Pop rock |280.000 - 300.000 |- |Excesso |Eu Sou Aquele |1997 |Pop |165.000 |} ==References== Portugal
title: List of best-selling albums in Portugal
